title: Riot is Petty AF
body: We are having real bad storms in Central Texas right now, which caused me to lose connection for a minute or so, I reconnect before even getting an AFK warning. At the time I was 7/1. I came back and my team had lost 3 towers mid and an inhib and the enemy team was on baron. I ended up getting a triple kill followed by a double kill and then got baron. Ended 16/1/7 with 215 farm in a 30 minute game....Riot graded me at a D-

replies.body: If anyone is petty, its' the guy whining about some arbitrary letter grade in one match in a video game
KDA has very little to do with grading, just like it has very little to do with winning. It is a result, not a cause.

> KDA has very little to do with grading, just like it has very little to do with winning. It is a result, not a cause.

you're telling me 16/1/7 is a D- performance?

Yes, a monkey can achieve that depending on the champion in question. CS, objective damage, warding, champion damage, KDA, game time length, all play a part on what your grade will be and this is after factoring how other players are doing with that same champion in that same role you picked

its like pretty much telling you to flat our fuck over the other four players on your team because they instant you leave you can never get anything.

they NEED to make a system to tell if u COME BACK and if u DID anything when u "come back".

Exactly. For instance, if you're playing Zed mid, and the average Zed player in mid has a KDA of 30/2/16, 300 CS, and 40 vision score, and here you are with 16/1/7 and 200 CS, and let's say 10 vision score, you would have ranked as D- because you're below what the average is.
You also left the game and probably missed a lot of gold and objectives. That likes throws it way off.
